segments.content: Vercel released a new minor version of Next.js, with major DX improvements. Highlights include:
segments.sourceMdx: Vercel released a new minor version of Next.js, with major DX improvements. Highlights include:
segments.translated_content: Vercel发布Next.js新次要版本，带来重大开发者体验改进。亮点包括：

segments.content:
* Redesigned error UI and improved stack traces: A redesigned debugging experience leveraging the brand-new React [`captureOwnerStack()`](https://react.dev/reference/react/captureOwnerStack) API
* Streaming metadata: Async metadata will no longer block page rendering or client-side page transitions
* Turbopack performance improvements: Faster compile times and reduced memory usage
* React View Transitions (experimental): Experimental support for React's new View Transitions API
* Node.js Middleware (experimental): Experimental support for using the Node.js runtime in Middleware
segments.sourceMdx:
- Redesigned error UI and improved stack traces: A redesigned debugging experience leveraging the brand-new React [`captureOwnerStack()`](https://react.dev/reference/react/captureOwnerStack) API
- Streaming metadata: Async metadata will no longer block page rendering or client-side page transitions
- Turbopack performance improvements: Faster compile times and reduced memory usage
- React View Transitions (experimental): Experimental support for React's new View Transitions API
- Node.js Middleware (experimental): Experimental support for using the Node.js runtime in Middleware
segments.translated_content:
- 错误界面重设计及堆栈追踪优化：基于React全新[`captureOwnerStack()`](https://react.dev/reference/react/captureOwnerStack)API的调试体验
- 流式元数据：异步元数据不再阻塞页面渲染或客户端路由切换
- Turbopack性能提升：更快的编译速度和更低内存占用
- React视图过渡(实验性)：支持React新视图过渡API的实验功能
- Node.js中间件(实验性)：支持在中间件中使用Node.js运行时的实验特性

segments.content: A new TanStack library, years in the making, has just been released as stable. The announcement post highlights an interesting subset of its features:
segments.sourceMdx: A new TanStack library, years in the making, has just been released as stable. The announcement post highlights an interesting subset of its features:
segments.translated_content: 历经多年开发的TanStack新库正式发布稳定版。公告文章重点介绍了以下特性：

segments.content:
* Framework agnostic, headless: Supports 5 frameworks, including React used in the post's examples
* Extreme type safety: I must admit `<form.Field>` is a pretty cool API
* Schema validation: Support for Zod, Valibot, ArkType, Standard Schema
* Async validation, built-in debouncing, AbortSignal
* Isomorphic, multi-platform: share validation logic across client/server
segments.sourceMdx:
- Framework agnostic, headless: Supports 5 frameworks, including React used in the post's examples
- Extreme type safety: I must admit `<form.Field>` is a pretty cool API
- Schema validation: Support for Zod, Valibot, ArkType, Standard Schema
- Async validation, built-in debouncing, AbortSignal
- Isomorphic, multi-platform: share validation logic across client/server
segments.translated_content:
- 框架无关的无头设计：支持包括React在内的5种框架
- 极致类型安全：`<form.Field>`API设计令人惊艳
- 模式验证：支持Zod/Valibot/ArkType/Standard Schema
- 异步验证、内置防抖、AbortSignal支持
- 同构多平台：客户端/服务端验证逻辑共享

segments.content: ByteDance just announced Lynx, their native cross-platform technology. It’s used extensively in their production apps, including TikTok! With React bindings, it’s a serious competitor to React Native, and support for other frameworks is expected. The architectural choices are interesting, with a dual-thread model and different runtimes. It has support for some CSS and Web APIs that even React Native still doesn’t have and uses convenient built-in JSX intrinsic elements like `<view>`.
segments.sourceMdx: ByteDance just announced Lynx, their native cross-platform technology. It’s used extensively in their production apps, including TikTok\! With React bindings, it’s a serious competitor to React Native, and support for other frameworks is expected. The architectural choices are interesting, with a dual-thread model and different runtimes. It has support for some CSS and Web APIs that even React Native still doesn’t have and uses convenient built-in JSX intrinsic elements like `<view>`.
segments.translated_content: 字节跳动刚刚发布了其原生跨平台技术Lynx。该技术已广泛应用于包括TikTok在内的生产级应用！通过React绑定，它成为React Native的有力竞争者，未来还将支持其他框架。其双线程模型与多运行时架构设计颇具亮点，甚至支持部分React Native尚未实现的CSS和Web API，并内置了便捷的JSX原生元素如`<view>`。

segments.content: The feature set at launch is impressive, but there are also some surprising things you might dislike, such as using React 17 / Preact, or custom elements on the web. Time will tell whether the technology lives up to its promise and can truly compete with the established player. In any case, competition is healthy.
